#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define max 1000000
int a[max];//a array declared globally always is initialized with 0
long long int sum[max];

int main()
{

int U,i,j,n;


   a[1]=1;
   for(i=2;i*i<max;i++)
        {
        if(a[i]!=1)
        for(j=2;j*i<max;j++)
        {
            a[j*i]=1;
        }
        }

        for(i=1;i<max;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]==0)
            {
                sum[i]=sum[i-1]+i;
            }
            else
            {
                sum[i]=sum[i-1];
            }
        }
        scanf("%d",&n);
        while(n--)
        {
            scanf("%d",&U);
            printf("%lld\n",sum[U-1]);
        }





return 0;
}
